sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, Validators, FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user', templateUrl: './user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user.component.scss'], }) export class UserComponent implements OnInit { public transactionForm = this.fb.group({ amount: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required, Validators.pattern('^[0-9]*$'), ]), detail: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), }); constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit(): void {} public onSubmit() {} }
Welcome back Mr. FullStack User! Expenses: $5000
Transaction Detail Created Amount ($)
Seat 1, Row: 2, Section: 123 15/07/2023 1500
Seat 3, Row: 2, Section: 123 15/07/2023 3500
